Uses of Interface
org.actioncontroller.UserContext

  • Packages that use UserContext 
    Package Description
    org.actioncontroller
    Action Controller is a framework that takes "controller" classes and generates ApiControllerAction for each method annotated with a "routing mapper annotation" such as GET.
    org.actioncontroller.httpserver  
    org.actioncontroller.servlet  

    • Uses of UserContext in org.actioncontroller

      Methods in org.actioncontroller with parameters of type UserContext 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ApiControllerAction.invoke​(UserContext userContext, ApiHttpExchange exchange)
      Invokes this action on the given ApiHttpExchange by converting the exchange to method invocation arguments, invoking the method and converting the return value.
      void ApiControllerMethodAction.invoke​(UserContext userContext, ApiHttpExchange exchange)  
      void ApiControllerActionRouter.invokeAction​(ApiHttpExchange httpExchange, UserContext userContext)  
      protected void ApiControllerMethodAction.verifyUserAccess​(ApiHttpExchange exchange, UserContext userContext)

    • Uses of UserContext in org.actioncontroller.servlet

      Classes in org.actioncontroller.servlet that implement UserContext 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ApiServlet
      Subclass ApiServlet and implement init by calling registerController with all your controller classes.
